Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In normal rats , the whole brain sections exhibited complete staining with TTC .

Here, TTC is the only chemical entity mentioned in the paragraph. TTC stands for 2,3,5-triphenyltetrazolium chloride, a compound used in scientific research for staining damaged tissues.
